html:
12.18.19  11:31 pm   I am still struggling to complete the essays... I have set a deadline of MIDNIGHT! to be done with the first drafts of them but I do not know if it will happen. Even when they are drafted there will still be a ton of work and the actual deadline is soon...... :( I don't know how to make a good writing piece

     no one knows. but if it seems too much for you now, i would recommend trying shorter essays for a little while

12.18.19  11:30 pm   what's your vocal range?

     maybe from here to here

12.18.19  11:30 pm   i think the only way the idea being a public artist/figure/person isn't paralyzingly terrifying to me is if i imagine being as uncompromisingly true to my own tastes as possible. i know you know this but yeah. and thank you for hammering on the "do shorter projects...like way shorter" advice for so long, i think it's almost sunk in enough that i'm ready to try it. and don't forget that you're quite smart in addition to being stupid 

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.18.19  11:27 pm   How do you come up with such creative visuals to your videos?

     it's like setting the dinner table. with each scene, i try to just set the dinner table, right there on the screen

12.18.19  11:00 pm   what was the question damien maymdien skipped over

     who is joe

12.18.19  10:57 pm   how much of your daily news intake first breaks to you from this page alone

     about 95%

12.18.19  10:48 pm   What kind of vibe does an orange tree produce?

     rad

12.18.19  10:47 pm   you look like taylor swift...

     fair enough

12.18.19  10:39 pm   What's for breakfast?

     lunch, and beyond

12.18.19  10:16 pm   Is it true you are learning how to animate in 3D?

     that's just one of the things i'm going to need

      I need answers.

12.18.19  10:12 pm   where are the videos?

     i am keeping them in my side pockets

12.18.19  10:05 pm   help, whenever i say something nobody knows what i'm trying to say and then i realize i don't either

     have you thought of putting on a comedy show

12.18.19  9:57 pm   any big projects you're working on?

     i am project

12.18.19  9:32 pm   2 questions:

1. Am looking for a keyboard for fooling around at home & possibly MIDI recording, any advice for what things I should be looking for in a good keyboard?

     make sure it's dynamic sensitive. most keyboards are

      2. Experience w/ MIDI recording in the past has been a lot of lag between keyboard and computer, any ways you know of to reduce this lag?

     reduce buffer size, quit other apps, make sure your computer is not among the world's weakest, etc

      Thabks

12.18.19  9:29 pm   hi bill when your reading this question you probably have a voice in your head while reading if, what does it sound like to you?

     the text fairy

12.18.19  9:25 pm   opinion on shallots/string theory?

     they are pretty good

12.18.19  9:09 pm   How do you plan on re-inventing the television?

     as it is re-invented again and again technologically, by scientists, i plan to help shape the content that is found on it

12.18.19  8:51 pm   What do you think of dogs and cats

     very good. i can almost tell them apart now

12.18.19  8:45 pm   Are you the real you?

     getting very close to it

12.18.19  8:38 pm   what type of bread do you like?

     shredded

12.18.19  8:36 pm   What should I build with this log I just had milled into lumber?

     how about building a logstack

12.18.19  8:26 pm   writing an essay about personal experiences, and feeling uncomfortable about it.... i wonder how to actually start writing

     pick one of the experiences, and start with a detail from it. start right on that detail. like it's a commercial

12.18.19  8:13 pm   do you like to learn about the mechanics/physics/engineering behind musical instruments?

     sometimes

      also please share any cool facts if you got any

     the saxophone is bent due to a longstanding curse

12.18.19  8:09 pm   what do you think of america compared to other countries

     very talkative; communicative

12.18.19  8:06 pm   take a ride on my blimp

     oh that sounds lovely

12.18.19  8:05 pm   Do you enjoy bread book?

     yes, i am reading it now

12.18.19  8:03 pm   what do you use to make your videos

     i just switched

12.18.19  8:01 pm   Bill wurtz... I have a confession to make. I remember a while back that I asked a question, but I completely forgot what it was! Can you please remind me of what it was?

     sure

12.18.19  7:56 pm   What do you think of life?

      it's one of those things i never knew existed but can't live without

12.18.19  7:50 pm   do you want anything for christmas?

     Yes! maybe a library

12.18.19  7:50 pm   Your music makes me smile and I often revisit your content for a pick-me-up.

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

      So thank you, Bill. I know being a creator isn't easy. I hope your patreon keeps food on your table, and you don't have to work a second day-job. I also, more primarily, hope you're happy and comfortable.

Are you happy and comfortable? :)

     yes, Comfortable is my middle name

12.18.19  7:40 pm   are there any standout roadblocks or bottlenecks you find yourself getting stuck on when you make music?

     yes, there have been bottle necks in the both the music and visuals department. once i finish taking both the blue and red pills at the same time, i will be glad to tell you what those bottle necks were

12.18.19  7:40 pm   how do i become less crap at music production lol

     do it simpler for just a moment. take it down to 1 or 2 instruments. see what happens

12.18.19  7:33 pm   thoughts on food?

     fake

12.18.19  7:33 pm   thank you for reminding me that there are good people in this world also my question is how do you stay so happy without being angry

     if you construct the right reverberation chamber, the anger will still be there but it will bounce around in such a way that it will produce a lot of other interesting & good feelings, and what bit of the anger that stays around is actually good and necessary for the quality of the show

12.18.19  7:23 pm   Can you tie your own shoelaces? 

     yes, i will be giving tutorials on that

12.18.19  7:10 pm   how long does it take to edit your music/youtube videos because it looks very complicated

     it takes about 100 years give or take

12.18.19  6:59 pm   do you ever go to sleep?

     yes! first i have to invent sleep!!!

12.18.19  6:40 pm   Do you have any advice for anxiety?

     yes

      I'm unreasonably anxious, even around my family. I don't even really listen to the music I like around them, because in my mind, it's like if I disagree with anyone's opinion ever, I'm a bad person. For clarity, I've never really had troubles with judgmental people, this is all just in my own head.

     it sounds like you may enjoy writing

12.18.19  6:34 pm   which better car or plane and why ?

     how about combining the two

12.18.19  6:25 pm   when's the next video?

     right away. oh i just remembered i am having a countdown timer. this is important, i will adhere to this

12.18.19  6:20 pm   hi

i've found myself creating lots of content but instead of releasing it all at once i've had it scheduled for one every week. from here i'm realizing that i'm scheduling stuff that won't take place until next decade ... or maybe even longer than a WHOLE MONTH from the time of actually creating it. have you ever had a situation with finished content but not publishing until later?

     yes

      and if so, did you write in the dates on the published date or the original finish date?

     on this site it's usually date made. except for the reality page, which is dated based on when the original footage is from, not the editing

      i'm not fully sure which is better, but i've been using the publish date as when it was "made."

have a nice day.

12.18.19  6:19 pm   How do you make such good jingles? I need to know for some projects

     the 15,000th one is usually pretty good, and then the rest after that are usually pretty good

12.18.19  6:11 pm   how do I become more intelligent? 

     be careful .... you may already have become too intelligent

12.18.19  6:07 pm   how to deal with mean humans

     niceness!

12.18.19  5:37 pm   Why is life?

     every possible reason. find all 12

12.18.19  5:27 pm   what is your opinion on opinions

     fake

12.18.19  5:23 pm   What are you doing for next video?

     i was hoping i could do every video

12.18.19  5:06 pm   how do you cook your toast?

     prefer uncooked; raw toast

12.18.19  4:52 pm   What was your favourite childhood Christmas present?

     24 hour analog clock (with hands)
